mig.core

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • mig.core.Personage
      • mig.core.Player

  • public class Player
extends Personage
    Player is the class representing the user of the game. It is in inheritence class of Personage.

    The player has more functions than Personage and PNJ, because he is the most importance personage in the game.

    Personage contains these elements :

    • A name, fixed when the game is created
    • Is the personage is the killer
    • He can move between rooms
    • We can know in which room he is
    • See which object he has in the inventory
    • He can add an item in his inventory
    • He also can remove an item of his inventory
    Version:
    22/11/2016
    Author:
    Group8
    See Also:
    Personage

      • Player

        public Player(java.lang.String name,
              Room currentRoom)
        Constructor, allows to create the player.
        Parameters:
        name - The name has to be in lower case for the security. So that there is no matter when we enter a name with upper case.
        currentRoom, - where is the player at this moment of the game
